txt.en: 'Glad to see you. I have heard some troubling news, and so I must ask for your help.\n\n'Other farm-hands have spotted Ekhamâti scouts in the marshes just to the north of here. You must stop them before they can bring any reports back to their leaders. It would endanger us all if they succeed.'
'I am relieved to see you return!\n\n'I know that more Ekhamâti will show themselves in time, but you have given us peace of mind for now. Thank you friend.'
Talmûri informed you that farmers in the area have spotted Ekhamâti scouts hiding in the marshes nearby. She asks that you stop them before they can bring information back to the enemy.
Talmûri informed you that farmers in the area have spotted Ekhamâti scouts hiding in the marshes nearby. She asked that you stop them before they can bring information back to the enemy.
Return to Talmûri in Burukíri and let her know you have dealt with the scouts in the marshes.
